page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: Excerpts from Parish News Aug.1985 Parish of All Saints' Bradbourne (with Ballidon) Calendar: SUN. 4. Pentecost 10: 3pm.Evensong - Revd R.H.Fuller SUN.11. Pentecost 11: 3pm.Evensong - Revd R.H.Fuller SUN.18. Pentecost 12: 9.30a.m. Holy Communion (rite A) Mon.19. 7.p.m. Holy Communion, Aldwark SUN.25. Pentecost 13: 11a.m. Holy Communion; 3p.m. Evensong at Ballidon SUN. 1 September. Pentecost 14: Missionary Sunday: 8.30 am Holy Communion; 3p.m. Evensong. Collections for June Â£180.08 Communicants: 92 Holy Baptism: July 21. Dafydd Simon Glynne Jones; Craig Andrew Wheeldon Richard Mark Wilkinson Burial: Annie Gerard (69) in cemetery
